statements: SELECT * FROM digital_art_platform_users;
SELECT username, email FROM digital_art_platform_users;
SELECT user_id, username, account_type FROM digital_art_platform_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT email, username FROM digital_art_platform_users WHERE account_type = 'artist';
SELECT * FROM digital_art_platform_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT username, email FROM digital_art_platform_users WHERE account_type = 'admin'
SELECT * FROM digital_art_platform_users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM digital_art_platform_users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT username, account_type FROM digital_art_platform_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR account_type = 'user' ORDER BY account_type, username
SELECT user_id, username, email, account_type FROM digital_art_platform_users WHERE user_id < 100 OR account_type = 'artist'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, username, permission_type FROM users INNER JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM art_platform.artworks WHERE artist_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT artwork_id, artist_name, date_created FROM art_platform WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo Da Vinci' ORDER BY date_created ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts JOIN user_permissions ON user_accounts.user_id = user_permissions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT title, artist_id FROM artworks WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT id, role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT permission_name, role_id FROM permissions WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT title, artist_id, description FROM artworks WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT id, role_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT id, email, password FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT art_id, title, artist_id FROM digital_art ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT permission_name FROM user_permissions WHERE user_role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM art_comments WHERE art_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%com';
SELECT art_id, title, art_description, users.username AS artist_username FROM digital_art JOIN users ON digital_art.artist_id = users.user_id WHERE users.username = 'John_Doe';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN user_permissions ON user_roles.user_role_id = user_permissions.user_role_id;

SELECT digital_art.title, users.username AS artist, art_comments.comment_text FROM digital_art JOIN users ON digital_art.artist_id = users.user_id JOIN art_comments ON digital_art.art_id = art_comments.art_id WHERE art_comments.comment_text LIKE '%great work%';
